title: Is there is fee waiver for renew work authorization ??
question: I Don't have now $380 fee to renew my work authorization, and I want get fee waiver for that , how can I do it?
question_tags: Immigration,Employment Authorization Document,Bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Foreign and immigrant workers
answers: You'll need to ask USCIS for a fee waiver and fill out the Form therefor, listing your monthly expenses, debts, etc. USCIS rarely,if ever, grants fee waivers, however.

Please see Form I-912 for a possible fee waiver.

Good luck,
